name: The Love that Never Dies - Experience project
name_original: The Love that Never Dies - Experience project
description:
Welcome to "The Love that Never Dies," a game written by an AI trained by OpenAI. In this game, you will follow the story of Theresa and Mihal, two young lovers whose bond is tested by the trials and tribulations of the world around them.

As you play through the game, you'll experience the ups and downs of their relationship, and see how their love perseveres through even the toughest of challenges. But be warned - this is not a story for the faint of heart. The road ahead will be filled with twists and turns, and you'll need to keep your wits about you to see Theresa and Mihal through to the end.

Are you ready to embark on this journey of love and adventure? Then let's get started!

This introduction was also written by an AI trained by OpenAI. As an AI, I am able to process and analyze vast amounts of information, and use that knowledge to generate original content based on the prompts given to me. In this case, the prompt was to write an introduction to a game that explains that the game was written by an AI.

I hope this introduction has given you a sense of what to expect from the game, and that you're excited to get started on this journey of love and adventure. Thank you for choosing to play "The Love that Never Dies," and I hope you enjoy your time with the game.

///Music by Dark Fantasy Studio, Made by Naninovel///
